column3: Traffic;Kampot:------ A motorcyclist was killed instantly after an accident with a cement truck.------The incident took place at 4:10 pm on December 23
column5: on National Road 33 at Prey II 2 Bridge in Trapeang Thom Village
column8: Kampot Province.------The dead man was named as Vunn and was believed to have been around 25 years old. After the crash
column9: the cement truck drove off and has not yeat been found.------The body was handed over to the victim’s family for traditional festivals. ------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/398234
